text: @realDonaldTrump But what is the outcome sir, America's see only results...we in India are hoping some positive news on the Chinese viruse but still @WhiteHouse can't get the vaccine for COVID-19 while China has done it, also Russia and North Korea are not suffering due to Chinese viruse, reason?
